TextLibrary.Text: Some disturbing news... the LeapGate network has contracted what seems like a virus. LeapGates are failing all over. I was on my way back to you, but I'm stuck in the Ceti System. The LeapGate system can be hacked, and I think your talents might be better suited for this than mine. If you hack the Ceti LeapGate, I'll come through to Erebus.

The LeapGate system can be hacked, and I think your talents might be better suited for this than mine. If you hack the Ceti LeapGate, I'll come through to Erebus.
